variable.name: TESTVERID
variable.comment: Use this id to merge the specimen tests reference file (spec_tests) with the specimen results file (spec_results)

variable.name: TESTVAL
variable.comment: Basic summary statistics of results values by TESTID can be found in the specimen tests reference file (spec_tests).

variable.name: TESTDY
variable.comment: Number of days from date of specimen draw to when the specimen was sent to the lab for testing.

variable.name: PULLID
variable.comment: The id of the study pull responsible for the test result. Pull ids are in the form xxx-yyy where xxx is the study id. A 'pull' is a set of vials pulled from the repository and shipped to one or more lab(s). A study will often have several pulls even if they only use a single lab. Multiple pulls are created to control workload and to limit the damage in case of shipping errors. Summary statistics for assays by pull can be found at www.whi.org in the specimen results page of the WHI data section.
